talks.title: Modularising Applications for Scale
talks.description: A talk about how to modularise your iOS applications for scale, covering the basics of modularisation, the tools you need, and the mindset you need to have.

talks.title: Hacking your life in 24 hours
talks.description: A talk about how to hack your life in 24 hours, covering the basics of hacking, the tools you need, and the mindset you need to have.
